An image featuring a creature that is both monstrous and demonic. These creatures are distinctly non-human and typically exhibit features such as [[fangs]], [[demon horns]], [[clawed feet]] or [[hooves]], [[bat wings]], a [[pentagram]], [[extra eyes]] and [[long tail]]s. Their skin color is usually different from that of human skin, and may also be goat like. These beings are often referred to as inhabitants of Hell in the mythos of Abrahamic religions.

For images depicting humans with demonic features, use the tags [[demon boy]] or [[demon girl]] instead.

title: alsok
body:
ALSOK, officially known as Sohgo Security Services Co., Ltd., is a prominent Japanese security company founded in 1965. Headquartered in Tokyo,
ALSOK provides comprehensive security services including alarm systems, surveillance, and personnel security.
The company is known for its commitment to safety and innovation, offering tailored security solutions for both individuals and businesses across Japan.

title: shiori_(princess_connect!)
body:
A character from [[Princess Connect!]] and Princess Connect! Re:Dive. She is of the [[tiger girl|beast race]] and a member of the guild Elizabeth Park.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] with [[hair between eyes]], [[small breasts]], and [[yellow eyes]], as well as black and white striped [[tiger ears]] and [[striped tail|a]] [[tiger tail]] with similar coloration. She usually wears a green and white [[bandeau]] (sometimes drawn as a [[crop top]]) and a [[green skirt|green]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[miniskirt]] with a [[brown belt]]. She also wears a [[fur capelet]], [[shoulder armor]] on her right shoulder only, [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[elbow gloves]], [[white thighhighs]], [[gauntlets]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]].

[[official_alternate_costume|Alternate in-game outfits]] of hers include:

* [[shiori_(magical_girl)_(princess_connect!)|Magical Girl Shiori]]
* [[shiori_(ranger)_(princess_connect!)|Ranger Shiori]]

In the anime, she has a [[dark persona]] (depicted in e.g. post #4004566), who is [[monochrome]] except for her [[purple eyes]].

[[Hatsune (Princess Connect!)|]] is her sister.

[spoiler]Her name in the real world before the events of Re:Dive was [[shiori_(real)_(princess connect!)|Kashiwazaki Shiori]] (柏崎栞).[/spoiler]

She is voiced by [[Koshimizu Ami]].

h4. External Links

* "Princess Connect Re:Dive Wiki: Shiori":https://princess-connect.fandom.com/wiki/Shiori

title: oda_nobunaga_(koha-ace)
body:
Archer-class servant from the Type-Moon parody work [[Koha-Ace]], originally appearing under the alias "Demon Archer". Later appeared in Fate/Grand Order. A [[genderswap (mtf)|genderswapped]] version of the Japanese Sengoku-era warlord [[Oda Nobunaga|of the same name]]. Often being referred as "Nobu" for short.

Her Noble Phantasm is Three Thousand Worlds, a barrage of shots from the many muskets she used that gained her the title of "Devil King of Sixth Heaven".

Nobunaga were often depicted in [[naked cape]] as a result of a running gag in Koha-Ace about how she would occasionally "feeling hot", referencing the real life counterpart's death during the Honnouji temple incident. This were later elaborated upon in a more symbolic meaning in [[Fate/Grand Order]] (where this specific "outfit" is available as her final ascension art) as being her "accepting" her death and giving up on her honor and power that she can't take to the afterlife.

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[keikenchi]] ([[pako (pakosun)|]] in [i][[Fate/Grand Order]][/i])
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Kugimiya Rie]]

h4.See also

title: tsukinogi_(arknights)
body:
[i]Tsukinogi, former Catastrophe Messenger from Higashi, is supporting the Doctor in controlling the flow of battle.[/i]

A playable Supporter Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Higashi[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]May 3[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Elafia[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]165 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]2 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former Catastrophe Messenger and a Shinto shrine maiden, her sensitive perception allows her to detect approaching Catastrophes from the most minute of changes and communicates that information with cities. Her abilities also make her well-suited to locating and tracking hidden enemies.

Her [[voice actor]] is [[Oohara Sayaka]].

h4. Skins

* [[Tsukinogi (Londinium Style Miko) (arknights)|Londinium Style Miko]]
* [[Tsukinogi (Dance) (arknights)|Dance]]
other_names: ツキノギ(アークナイツ)

title: sakura_megumi
body:
An adult female character from [[Gakkou Gurashi!]]. She has [[pink hair]] that is [[short_hair_with_long_locks|cut short on the fronts and sides and very long in the back]] with a large [[ahoge]].  Her typical attire is a [[dress]] with her hair adorn with a [[hairclip]] and a [[hair_ribbon|ribbon]] tying her hair into [[low ponytail]].

She is a teacher and the adviser for Campus Life Club.
[spoiler]It's revealed during the series that she has been dead from the beginning, and that her appearances throughout were hallucinations by [[takeya_yuki|Yuki]].[/spoiler]

title: ringo_mogire_beam
body:
"Apple Plucking Beam." Opening theme to [[Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei|Zan Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei]], the third season of the show. The song is performed by [[Ootsuki Kenji]] same as the first openings to the other two seasons.

Frequent imagery appearing during the intro include [[apple]]s, [[UFO|UFOs]], and other space-themed motifs. The intro uses signifigantly more color than those of the first two seasons.

Two alternate versions of the intro sequence were done for the Zan Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Bangaichi OVAs, including a three-minute version which can be downloaded here: http://www.mediafire.com/?dymgv2jnggl
